title: Planetarium Ghost Travel: The Collected Works Of Sakatsuki Sakana
alternative_title: プラネタリウム・ゴースト・トラベル：坂月さかな作品集 ; Planetarium Ghost Travel: Sakatsuki Sakana Sakuhin-shu
status: プラネタリウム・ゴースト・トラベル：坂月さかな作品集 ; Planetarium Ghost Travel: Sakatsuki Sakana Sakuhin-shu
description:
Description :
        A combination illustration and manga artbook featuring the ultramarine works and fantastical world of Sakatsuki Sakana. ---The few short manga stories included are a side stories that served as a precursor to Sakatsuki's eventual ongoing publication (https://mangadex.org/title/77c7d3eb-16e9-4ef2-81f0-4d3876a037c5/star-tripper-planetarium-ghost-travel). They are irrelevant to the main storyline, but follow 303's solo travels around Sakatsuki's starry universe.- 3.1 - Prologue- 3.2 - Listening to the Rain- 3.3 - Buying Sweets- 3.4 - Drinking Kikiriri- 3.5 - Seeing Space Fashion- 3.6 - Climbing the Tower- 3.7 - Making A Guess- 3.8 - Epilogue

chapters.chapter_name: Vol.1 Chapter 3.2: Listening To The Rain
Vol.1 Chapter 2: A Sleepless Boy's Journey To The Moon
Vol.1 Chapter 1: A Star Tripper's Scenery
